params.totalBorrowAssets: Current total borrow assets in the pool
params.totalSupplyAssets: Current total supply assets in the pool

params.totalBorrowAssets: Total assets borrowed from the pool
params.totalSupplyAssets: Total assets supplied to the pool

returns.borrowRate: The current borrow interest rate in basis points per year

returns._baseRate: Current base rate in basis points
returns._optimalUtilization: Current optimal utilization in basis points

params.totalBorrowAssets: Total assets borrowed from the pool
params.totalSupplyAssets: Total assets supplied to the pool

returns.supplyRate: The current supply interest rate in basis points per year

params.totalBorrowAssets: Total assets borrowed from the pool
params.totalSupplyAssets: Total assets supplied to the pool

returns.utilizationRate: The current utilization rate in basis points (10000 = 100%)

returns._0: lendingPool The address of the lending pool

params._lendingPool: The address of the lending pool

params._baseRate: New base interest rate in basis points
params._optimalUtilization: New optimal utilization rate in basis points
params._slope1: New slope1 parameter in basis points
params._slope2: New slope2 parameter in basis points

autoAdjustInterestRateModel(uint256,uint.notice: Automatically adjust interest rate model parameters based on pool state.

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate the current borrow interest rate based on utilization.

getInterestRateModel().notice: Get current interest rate model parameters.

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate the current supply interest rate.

getUtilizationRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate the current utilization rate of the pool.

setLendingPool(address).notice: Set the lending pool address that can update parameters

updateInterestRateModelManual(uint256,ui.notice: Manual update of interest rate model parameters (for admin use).
